mapper.select: select IFNULL(EP_ID,'') AS epId, IFNULL(WORKSHOP_ID,'') AS workshopId, IFNULL(WORKSHOP_NAME,'') AS workshopName, IFNULL(PRODUCT,'') AS product, IFNULL(PROCESS,'') AS process from SL_EP_WORKSHOP where EP_ID=#{filterMap.epId} AND (DEL_FLG=#{filterMap.delFlg} OR ISNULL(DEL_FLG))

select IFNULL(EP_ID,'') AS epId, IFNULL(FTY_ASSET,'') AS ftyAsset, IFNULL(FTY_REG_CAPITAL,'') AS ftyRegCapital, IFNULL(FTY_LAND_AREA,'') AS ftyLandArea, IFNULL(FTY_FLOOR_AREA,'') AS ftyFloorpArea, IFNULL(FTY_EQUIPMENT,'') AS ftyEquipment, IFNULL(FTY_DESIGN_CAP,'') AS ftyDesignCap, IFNULL(FTY_ACTUAL_CAP,'') AS ftyActualCap, IFNULL(FTY_FT_RATE,'') AS ftyFtRate, IFNULL(FTY_DS_RATE,'') AS ftyDsRate, IFNULL(FTY_AS_RATE,'') AS ftyAsRate, IFNULL(SCAP_MATERIAL,'') AS scapMaterial, IFNULL(SCAP_PRODUCT,'') AS scapProduct from SL_EP_CAP where EP_ID=#{filterMap.epId} AND (DEL_FLG=#{filterMap.delFlg} OR ISNULL(DEL_FLG))

select IFNULL(EP_ID,'') AS epId, IFNULL(FTY_ASSET,'') AS ftyAsset, IFNULL(FTY_REG_CAPITAL,'') AS ftyRegCapital, IFNULL(FTY_LAND_AREA,'') AS ftyLandArea, IFNULL(FTY_FLOOR_AREA,'') AS ftyFloorpArea, IFNULL(FTY_EQUIPMENT,'') AS ftyEquipment, IFNULL(FTY_DESIGN_CAP,'') AS ftyDesignCap, IFNULL(FTY_ACTUAL_CAP,'') AS ftyActualCap, IFNULL(FTY_FT_RATE,'') AS ftyFtRate, IFNULL(FTY_DS_RATE,'') AS ftyDsRate, IFNULL(FTY_AS_RATE,'') AS ftyAsRate, IFNULL(SCAP_MATERIAL,'') AS scapMaterial, IFNULL(SCAP_PRODUCT,'') AS scapProduct, IFNULL(LAB_AREA,'') AS labArea, IFNULL(LAB_FUNCTION,'') AS labFunction, IFNULL(LAB_INVESTMENT,'') AS labInvestment, IFNULL(LAB_MEMBER,'') AS labMember, IFNULL(DD_EQUIPMENT,'') AS ddEquipment from SL_EP_CAP where EP_ID=#{filterMap.epId} AND (DEL_FLG=#{filterMap.delFlg} OR ISNULL(DEL_FLG))
